main event: A single, white oval-shaped object was observed moving very fast and erratically through the sky for about 8 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed from the ground in Dayton, Ohio.
No known aircraft or vehicle could account for the sighting.
The object was described as a large, round glow about the size of a dime at arm's length.
The object moved rapidly to the east, then stopped and hovered, before flashing, flickering and moving slowly to the south and disappearing.
The observer reported no sound associated with the object.
photographs: no photographs included in the report
